_From [jaze...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102707833900773093014/) on June 21, 2012 20:10:19_

See the attached picture. The overlay says "2G", and that's how much I have to pay. But the card image only has "1G" ! I checked on various M:tG sites to be sure, and they confirm the bug. As far as I know, M:tG cards are never patched(which is typical for board games), they can be banned at most.
